input_data.info: Accepts either a DataFrame or a Data object.

mode.info: Convert into raw string instead of using a template.

pattern.info: Use variables within curly brackets to extract column values for DataFrames or key values for Data. For example: `Name: {Name}, Age: {Age}, Country: {Country}`

clean_data.info: Enable to clean the data by removing empty rows and lines in each cell of the DataFrame/Data object.

success.text_parsed: Successfully parsed {lines} lines into text (length: {length} characters)
success.string_converted: Successfully converted input to string (length: {length} characters)

warnings.no_lines_generated: No lines were generated from the template formatting.
warnings.empty_input_data: Input data is empty or null.

errors.data_list_not_supported: List of Data objects is not supported.
errors.unsupported_input_type: Unsupported input type: {actual_type}. Expected DataFrame or Data.
errors.template_key_missing: Row {row}: Template key '{key}' not found in row data
errors.data_key_missing: Template key '{key}' not found in data. Available keys: {available_keys}
errors.data_formatting_failed: Failed to format data with template: {error}
errors.list_item_conversion_failed: Failed to convert list item at index {index}: {error}
